channel.title: Need An iPod CD
channel.description:
Hey,
A friend gave me an iPod mini a couple of days ago. It's only using about 200mb out of it's 3.7, but it's got exetremley gay songs on it (dixie chicks, lion king, etc., etc.) and I wanted to format it and enable it for disk use and put my own songs on it.. but iTunes won't even recognize it as an iPod. I had a 30gb iPod video but it got stolen so I chucked the cd. So if anyone could copy the cd stuff and upload it, rep to you.
[center]Thanks, Buzzy [/center]

item.title: Need An iPod CD
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

cuz it wont recognize the iPod when I plug it in.
